---
title: "Geographic Variation in Food Prices and the Effect of Food Programs on the Well-Being of the Elderly"
author: 
  - Benjamin Delgado
  - Lara Shore-Sheppard
---

I leverage plausibly exogenous geographic variation in the real value of SNAP benefits to examine the effects of variation in SNAP purchasing power on program enrollment, health outcomes, and health care utilization among the elderly
